app_description: Farsi Nevis keyboard extension simplifies Farsi typing effortlessly. It automatically transliterates Farsi words written in English letters Pinglish Finglish to Farsi script as you type. Key Features: Streamlined design for easy use Automatic transliteration Universal keyboard compatible with all your apps Full text translation from Farsi to various languages Supported languages: English French Spanish Turkish Arabic German Dutch Japanese Korean Russian Swedish Chinese Customize the keyboard with vibrant themes Clipboard functionality Number row for quick access Emoji support In app converter for handling large text volumes Upgrade now for a seamless Farsi typing experience!
